tags: None
review: Dr.prakash ayyadurai had a wide knowledge about sports injuries, he was very kind and polite ,listened to my problem....didn't interrupt in between.... I would surely recommend him for my family and friends... Now my shoulder pain is gone,doesn't unnecessarly order tests.......I consulted 3 ortho doctors before consulting him but all gave nly surgery as an option but he treated with just physiotherapy... Thanks once again doc

His approach is good...

tags: None
review: He is the best Orthopedic surgeon that I know of. I happened to go to his clinic a couple of years ago when my wife fractured her ankle. He treated her well & she's back to normal now. I traveled 250 kilometers just to get his opinion for my mother-in-law for her back & leg pain. He clearly explained her ailments & patiently answered all our questions. The best attribute about him is that as great of a Doctor that he is, he is a better human being. ie....he really cares for his patients & it's not about making money. If u want the exact diagnosis & treatment for your ailments GO TO DR. PRAKASH

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Great. He's kind .my health is a bit better than before. Since my problem is some slow one to get rid. He's very experienced.

review: First experience is good. We are satisfied with the service of doctor. At present we are undergoing the treatment prescribed by the doctor. Exactly it is very difficult for us to give fair assessment. We hope for best and certainly we would give our assessment after completion of treatment . There is no doubt that approach of doctor is very good.
